title.en: The Falling Rain of Blessings: A Prayer of Inspiration

text.en: Namo! Essence of all Buddhas,
text.en-trans: namo, sangye tamché kyi ngowo

text.en: Master of all Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö tamché kyi dakpo

text.en: Source of all blessings,
text.en-trans: jinlab kün gyi jungné

text.en: To the guru I pray!
text.en-trans: lama la solwa deb so

text.en: Bless my body with your wisdom body,
text.en-trans: lü la ku yi jingyi lob shik

text.en: Bless my speech with your wisdom speech,
text.en-trans: ngak la sung gi jingyi lob shik

text.en: Bless my mind with your wisdom mind,
text.en-trans: yi la tuk kyi jingyi lob shik

text.en: Until I attain enlightenment, look on me with your compassion, inspire me with your blessing!
text.en-trans: nam zhik changchub ma tob kyi bardu tukjé zik la jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ! Unborn is the dharmakāya, the body of truth and meaning;
text.en-trans: om ah hung, chöku kyewa mepa dön gyi ku

text.en: Unceasing is the sambhogakāya, spontaneous perfection;
text.en-trans: longku gakpa mepa lhün gyi drub

text.en: Unobstructed is the nirmāṇakāya, accomplishing the benefit of beings;
text.en-trans: tulku tokpa mepé dro dön dzé

text.en: Unlimited are the noble buddha qualities, all perfect in you;
text.en-trans: yönten pak tu mepa rang la dzok

text.en: Uninterrupted is your enlightened activity, guiding sentient beings!
text.en-trans: trinlé gyün ché mepé drowa dren

text.en: Gurus, yidams, ḍākinīs, dharmapālas,
text.en-trans: lama yidam khandro chökyong dang

text.en: Vīras, and vīriṇīs—you are the embodiment of all:
text.en-trans: pawo pamo kün gyi daknyi ni

text.en: Great and noble Padmākara, here in person,
text.en-trans: jetsün chenpo pema jungné ngö

text.en: I have no other refuge, no other hope but you;
text.en-trans: kyab dang resa khyé lé machipé

text.en: So to you I pray, Orgyen Rinpoche—
text.en-trans: solwa deb so orgyen rinpoche

text.en: Hold me with your compassion, without ever parting!
text.en-trans: tukjé dralwa mepar zung du sol

text.en: Grant me the attainments in my practice, without any obstacle!
text.en-trans: ngödrub tokpa mepar tsal du sol

text.en: Carry out your enlightened activity, always without any effort!
text.en-trans: trinlé bemé drubpar dzé du sol

text.en: Namo! I awaken the heart of the enlightened mind, the bodhicitta;
text.en-trans: namo dak ni changchub chok tu semkyé dé

text.en: In this secret maṇḍala of Vajrakumāra
text.en-trans: dorje purpa sangwé kyilkhor du

text.en: I shall practise exactly according to your teachings!
text.en-trans: khyé kyi ka zhin jesu drub lak na

text.en: Grant your blessing so there be no obstacles to my practice!
text.en-trans: drub la barché mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessings so I obtain the siddhis, ordinary and supreme!
text.en-trans: ngödrub nam nyi tobpar jingyi lob

text.en: May all of you in the retinue: deities who carry out actions, vīras and vīriṇīs,
text.en-trans: khor gyi lejé pawo pamo dang

text.en: Vidyādharas, and ḍākinīs in their hundreds of thousands,
text.en-trans: rigdzin khandro bumtrak mangpo nam

text.en: Look upon me, this child of devotion, with the love of your wisdom mind,
text.en-trans: möpé bu la tsewé tuk kyi gong

text.en: And let your blessings inspire my mind, inspire my heart, without any end!
text.en-trans: taktu dudral mepar jingyi lob
